alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Charlotte and northwestern Lee Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Charlotte County Airport to 6 miles southeast of Punta Gorda to near Palmona Park. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Punta Gorda, Charlotte County Airport, Burnt Store Marina, Tropical Gulf Acres, Placida, Charlotte Park, Cleveland, Pirate Harbor, Solana, Charlotte Harbor, Rotonda and Bokeelia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte
